line.originaltext: Lay out two long sheets of aluminum foil crosswise.
line.annotation: create_tool(t20, "2 long sheets of aluminum foil")

line.originaltext: Pat the roast dry, and place in the center of the foil.
Generously coat the roast with the mustard mixture.
Wrap the foil tightly around the roast, then apply one more piece of foil to really seal it in so that the roast can be rotated without all of the juices spilling out.
line.annotation: do(ing92, t20, ing93, "wrapped roast", "wrap tightly, add another piece of foil")

line.originaltext: Prepare an outdoor grill for indirect heat.
For charcoal, light the coals, then move to one side of the grill.
Place the roast on the grill, and cover.
line.annotation: cook(ing93, t21, ing94, "roasted roast", "on unlit side")

line.originaltext: Cook for about 2 hours, turning every 30 to 45 minutes, or until the internal temperature is at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
